prose.p: To create a hunt, you need the secret for this site. Ask the site owner if you don't know it.
The key is a short identifier for the hunt; it will be used as part of the URL. The key must only contain LETTERS, NUMBERS, and DASHES. The hunt key is permanent; you cannot change it.

The hunt's name is the name that puzzlers will see. This can contain whatever you want, including spaces. It can even be the same name as a previous hunt (though you probably shouldn't). You'll have the option of changing it later.
The password is the password for the hunt, and gives permission to edit the hunt.
